sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['abc.txt'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared blob0405 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://saccnt0405.blob.core.windows.net/wra0405/Employee.txt"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = blob0405,
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(Source, {{"name", Order.Descending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
